column5: 2 Bedrooms with Queen Beds and Comphy Sheets One bathroom with shower. This little Farmhouse sets 2 miles from the small country town of Cherokee Tx. 17 Miles N. of Llano Texas and 15 miles S. of San Saba Texas. A place to get away from everyday city life. come to the country and get away. Take a walk down a country road, see the wildlife enjoy peace and quiet. Flavored Coffee awaits you as you sit on the back patio that over looks the Costal field and watch the deer come in and graze.
